django.contrib.gis.feeds

Classes

GeoFeedMixin

This mixin provides the necessary routines for SyndicationFeed subclasses

GeoRSSFeed

Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()

GeoAtom1Feed

Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()

W3CGeoFeed

Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()

Feed

This is a subclass of the Feed from django.contrib.syndication.

Module Contents

class django.contrib.gis.feeds.GeoFeedMixin[source]

This mixin provides the necessary routines for SyndicationFeed subclasses to produce simple GeoRSS or W3C Geo elements.

georss_coords(coords)[source]

In GeoRSS coordinate pairs are ordered by lat/lon and separated by a single white space. Given a tuple of coordinates, return a string GeoRSS representation.

add_georss_point(handler, coords, w3c_geo=False)[source]

Adds a GeoRSS point with the given coords using the given handler. Handles the differences between simple GeoRSS and the more popular W3C Geo specification.

add_georss_element(handler, item, w3c_geo=False)[source]

Add a GeoRSS XML element using the given item and handler.

class django.contrib.gis.feeds.GeoRSSFeed(title, link, description, language=None, author_email=None, author_name=None, author_link=None, subtitle=None, categories=None, feed_url=None, feed_copyright=None, feed_guid=None, ttl=None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: django.utils.feedgenerator.Rss201rev2Feed, GeoFeedMixin

Base class for all syndication feeds. Subclasses should provide write()

rss_attributes()[source]
add_item_elements(handler, item)[source]

Add elements on each item (i.e. item/entry) element.

add_root_elements(handler)[source]

Add elements in the root (i.e. feed/channel) element. Called from write().

class django.contrib.gis.feeds.GeoAtom1Feed(title, link, description, language=None, author_email=None, author_name=None, author_link=None, subtitle=None, categories=None, feed_url=None, feed_copyright=None, feed_guid=None, ttl=None, **kwargs)[source]

Bases: django.utils.feedgenerator.Atom1Feed, GeoFeedMixin

root_attributes()[source]

Return extra attributes to place on the root (i.e. feed/channel) element. Called from write().

Add elements on each item (i.e. item/entry) element.

add_root_elements(handler)[source]

class django.contrib.gis.feeds.Feed[source]

Bases: django.contrib.syndication.views.Feed

This is a subclass of the Feed from django.contrib.syndication. This allows users to define a geometry(obj) and/or item_geometry(item) methods on their own subclasses so that geo-referenced information may placed in the feed.

feed_type[source]
feed_extra_kwargs(obj)[source]

Return an extra keyword arguments dictionary that is used when initializing the feed generator.

item_extra_kwargs(item)[source]

Return an extra keyword arguments dictionary that is used with the add_item call of the feed generator.
